A.P.Krishnan

front.extra:
PRAYER:- Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of India,
praying for the issuance of a Writ of Mandamus directing the fourth
respondent herein to give the transfer certificate of the petitioner daughter
namely A.P.K.Harini to the petitioner without demanding school fees.

Government Advocate
for R.1 to R.3
:
